title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“Last weekend, the Welcome Society, composed of original Penn colony settlers, held its annual meeting....” [The Philadelphia Inquirer, 1 November 1987. Submitted by Judy Tucker, Elkins Park, Pennsylvania.]
